text: Albert Tom was a member of the Arizona House of Representatives from 2005 through 2009. He was first elected to the House in November 2004, and was re- elected in 2006. He lost in the Democratic primary in 2008 to fellow incumbent Thomas Chabin and Christopher Deschene, both of whom went on to win in the general election. He made another attempt to regain his seat in the 2010 election, but again lost in the Democrat primary, this time to Tom Chabin and Albert Hale. ==References== Category:Arizona Democrats Category:Members of the Arizona House of Representatives Category:1956 births Category:Living people
title: Albert Tom
